meanings.definition: A spread made from vegetable oils, used as a substitute for butter.
meanings.sent1: My mom bought margarine instead of butter for our toast.
meanings.sent2: The margarine melted on the warm bread, making it delicious.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the margarine for yellow paint in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as margarine on a hot pan.
meanings.sent5: The margarine container gleamed under the kitchen lights.
